description: Charlie's Winery Ltd. is an innovative wine company that specializes in producing organic hibiscus wine. Inspired by a father's winemaking experiments, the winery utilizes locally sourced hibiscus flowers from Lake Victoria. This initiative not only offers a unique beverage option but also supports local farmers and promotes health benefits associated with hibiscus. With a focus on sustainability and organic practices, Charlie's Winery aims to educate consumers about the advantages of their product.
name: Charlie's Winery Ltd.
